title: Small Group Activity - How to round error terms to a single digit

quizDescription.text:
Purpose of the day
The purpose of this activity is to get to the heart of the purpose of expressing an error term and then leverage that to deal with the issue of rounding after doing a computation.

attachment: 04 Small Group Activity - How to _round_ error terms to a single digit.pdf

questions.questionText: Summarize the Small Group Activity - How to round error terms to a single digit
